title: Kitchen nightmares, 16-hour days, a ‘carb dungeon’: Day in the life of a Tour de France team chef
content:
Serving hors categorie cuisine from a tiny food truck is tough – Here's how EF Education-EasyPost chef Owen Blandy makes it happen.

Read the full article at Kitchen nightmares, 16-hour days, a ‘carb dungeon’: Day in the life of a Tour de France team chef on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
